disease: Malignant neoplasm of connective and soft tissue of right upper limb, including shoulder

symptoms.name: Shoulder pain
symptoms.pattern: May occur if tumor presses on a nerve

symptoms.name: Numbness in the shoulder
symptoms.pattern: May occur if tumor presses on a nerve

symptoms.name: Difficulty breathing
symptoms.pattern: May occur if tumor presses on surrounding muscles or blood vessels

physical_findings: Palpable mass in the right upper limb or shoulder

imaging_findings.CT scan: Provides detailed images of the mass and surrounding structures
imaging_findings.MRI: Provides detailed images of the soft tissues, helpful in assessing tumor extent and involvement of nearby structures

required: Imaging evidence of a mass in the right upper limb or shoulder
Histopathological confirmation of malignant neoplasm of connective or soft tissue
supportive: Clinical symptoms consistent with a soft tissue sarcoma

differential_diagnoses: Other types of sarcoma (e.g., synovial sarcoma)
